definitions.definition: A portion of a leaf found at the base of the petiole , when present.
In many grasses (Poaceae) and some sedges (Cyperaceae), the membranous appendage or ring of hairs projecting from the inner side of a leaf at the junction between the blade and the sheath .

secondary_definitions: ( botany ) A portion of a leaf found at the base of the petiole , when present.

( botany ) In many grasses (Poaceae) and some sedges (Cyperaceae), the membranous appendage or ring of hairs projecting from the inner side of a leaf at the junction between the blade and the sheath .
